bands.label: Fragile
bands.message: This household is carrying more digital strain than it should. That’s not a failure — it’s a starting point.

bands.label: Vulnerable
bands.message: Some protections exist, but gaps could cause stress or harm under pressure. Small changes here make a big difference.

bands.label: Stabilising
bands.message: The foundations are forming. With a few focused improvements, this household can move into a calmer, safer rhythm.

bands.label: Healthy
bands.message: This household has strong digital habits. Protection is mostly in place, with only minor areas to refine.

bands.label: Flourishing
bands.message: Digital life here supports calm, safety, and wellbeing. The focus now is maintenance and gentle growth.
